attributes.action: Use "Bad Lads Army" tactics on persistant offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned request the prime minister to stop the expansion of persistant offenders including children from the age of 13 and above by using millitary style "Bad Lads Army" style training as a corectional punishment.
We also would say that the lack of effective punishments for younger offenders allows them to develop their crime skills in advance of them ever getting punnishment that may make them think twice.
